**Free-Standing Soft-walled Structure Repairs at CFB Borden PSIB**
=============================================

**Reference Number:** WS4609971177-DC4610331095

**Tender Closing Date:** July 12, 2024, at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Publication Date:** May 29, 2024

This request for Standing Offer seeks a contractor to provide building and facility maintenance and repair services to the Department of National Defence at Canadian Forces Base Borden PSIB.

**Services Required**

The contractor will be responsible for performing building and facility maintenance and repair services, including but not limited to, infrastructure, building, and facility maintenance and repair services.

**Eligibility and Selection Criteria**

Eligible contractors will be selected based on Lowest Price.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is open to contractors from the following countries:

* Canada
* United Kingdom
* Honduras
* Canada
* Chile
* Peru
* Colombia
* Korea
* European Union
* World Trade Organization
* Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Panama
* Ukraine

**Geographic Location**

The contract will be executed in Ontario, with the exception of the National Capital Region.

**Contracting Entity**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is the contracting entity.
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information**

Contact: Jessica Canas (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Pursuant to the Ariba Discovery Posting, the closing time has been amended to July 12, 2024, at 2:00PM EDT. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this time to be considered. Bids submitted after 2:00PM EDT will be declared non-responsive.
